name: tada-k6-tests
description: K6 load testing suite for TADA media API

scripts.test:diagnosis: npm run build && k6 run dist/tada-diagnosis.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
scripts.test:single: npm run build && k6 run dist/single-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
scripts.test:multi: npm run build && k6 run dist/multi-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
scripts.test:catalog: npm run build && k6 run dist/catalog-test.js --env ENVIRONMENT=local
